title.narrative: Local support for trade mission Port of Amsterdam International

description.narrative: This project is providing local support (via a local consultant and budget for local expenditures) for the Netherlands Embassy in Abidjan to facilitate the maritime trade mission, organized by Port of Amsterdam International, from the Netherlands to Côte d’Ivoire (CdI), including a visit to the SITRANS fair in Abidjan. This includes the organization of the Netherlands stand at the fair and local support for the development of an impactful field-visits programme and matchmaking. The aim of the trade mission and the Netherlands stand is:• To promote and facilitate B2B links and knowledge transfer between Dutch companies and Ivorian/West-African companies and stakeholders with the aim of improving the Maritime and Logistics sectors in a more sustainable manner in Côte d’Ivoire/West-Africa; • To promote selected Port of Amsterdam International's projects, Dutch funded PSD programmes and activities in Maritime and Logistics sectors in Côte d’Ivoire and West-Africa and identify new partnerships and activities;• To promote opportunities in Côte d’Ivoire and in West-Africa to the Dutch Maritime and Logistics sectors; • To position the Netherlands and its companies, as a sustainable and innovative partner in the Maritime and Logistics sectors.Is dit voldoende?Overigens is 12,5k vanuit PSD budget gefinancierd en 6,5k uit BD budget, gezien ook de BD focus van het project. Dit is dus 19k in totaal, maar hiervan is dus maar 12,5k PSD/ODA geld.

participating-org.narrative: Netherlands embassy in Abidjan, Côte dÍvoire
